remarks: Multiplying a negated vector by a scalar.  (Contributed by Stefan O'Rear, 5-Sep-2015.)
statement:
lmodvsinv2.b $e |- B = ( Base ` W ) $.
lmodvsinv2.f $e |- F = ( Scalar ` W ) $.
lmodvsinv2.s $e |- .x. = ( .s ` W ) $.
lmodvsinv2.n $e |- N = ( invg ` W ) $.
lmodvsinv2.k $e |- K = ( Base ` F ) $.
lmodvsinv2 $p |- ( ( W e. LMod /\ R e. K /\ X e. B ) -> ( R .x. ( N ` X ) ) = ( N ` ( R .x. X ) ) ) $.
